config.MaxStackingNumber.name: Max Stacking Number
config.MaxStackingNumber.tooltip: The max stacking number, the default is 999.
config.DefaultCraftingAmount.name: Default cooking/crafting amount
config.DefaultCraftingAmount.tooltip: The default amount when you Shift+RightClick in the Cooking / Crafting menu
config.DefaultShopAmount.name: Default shop amount
config.DefaultShopAmount.tooltip: The default amount when you Shift+RightClick in a Shop menu
config.EnableStackSplitRedux.name: Enable Split Redux
config.EnableStackSplitRedux.tooltip: Enable Split Redux functionalities. Uncheck this box if you are experiencing any issue
ui.stacksplitmenu.title: Select Amount
config.EnableTackleSplit.name: Enable Tackle Stacking
config.EnableTackleSplit.tooltip: If enabled, fishing tackle can be stacked and their durability will be shared across the stack.
config.EnableStackEverything.name: Enable Stack Everything
config.EnableStackEverything.tooltip: If enabled, vanilla stacking rule is ignored.
